foreignData.name: Himmelsfestung-Kalmar
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
Landung — Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kann der Himmelsfestung-Kalmar in diesem Zug angreifen, als ob er nicht Verteidiger hätte.

foreignData.name: Calamar de aerorruina
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
Aterrizaje — Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el Calamar de aerorruina puede atacar este turno como si no tuviera la habilidad de defensor.

foreignData.name: Calamar du fort céleste
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
Toucheterre — À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le Calamar du fort céleste peut attaquer ce tour-ci comme s'il n'avait pas le défenseur.

foreignData.name: Calamaro dell'Enclave Celeste
foreignData.text:
Difensore
Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, il Calamaro dell'Enclave Celeste può attaccare in questo turno come se non avesse difensore.

foreignData.name: スカイクレイブのイカ
foreignData.text:
防衛
上陸 ― 土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、このターン、スカイクレイブのイカは防衛を持たないかのように攻撃できる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — イカ

foreignData.name: 하늘거주지 오징어
foreignData.text:
수비태세
대지력 — 대지가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 하늘거주지 오징어는 이 턴에 수비태세가 없는 것처럼 공격할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Lula do Enclave Celeste
foreignData.text:
Defensor
Aterragem — Toda vez que um terreno entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Lula do Enclave Celeste pode atacar neste turno como se não tivesse defensor.

foreignData.name: Кальмар Небесного Анклава
foreignData.text:
Защитник
Землепад — Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Кальмар Небесного Анклава может атаковать в этом ходу, как если бы у него не было способности Защитника.

foreignData.name: 空境乌贼
foreignData.text:
守军
地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，空境乌贼于本回合中能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。

foreignData.name: 空境烏賊
foreignData.text:
守軍
地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，空境烏賊於本回合中能視同不具守軍異能地進行攻擊。

name: Skyclave Squid
originalText:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Squid can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Skyclave Squid can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
